text: Ara amaderake nidarsana prerana kara theke sudhu eta'i birata rekheche ye, tadera purbabartigana tate mithyaropa karechila. Ara amara siksaprada nidarsanasbarupa samuda jatike ustri diyechilama, atahpara tara setara prati yuluma karechila. Amara to sudhu bhaya dekhanora jan'ya'i nidarsana pathiye thaki
